entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 10.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.
